title: Ennai Pandhada Song Lyrics Ullam Ketkumae
stanzas:
Senguyile.. siruveyile.
mannil illa valam
enna enna vendru
seyarkai kol ariyum
penne

unnil illa valam
ennadhenna ena
ullangai ariyum kanne

nee azhagin moththam
endra sollu.
andha brahman vaitha
muttru pulli.

Iniyavane.. ilaiyavane
unnai kaanvillai
ennum podhum nenjil
chinna paithiyangal
pudikkum.

hoi panju meththaigalil
thookkam illai endru
parkal thalaiyanaiyai
kadikkum.

unai thottu paarka
manam thudikkum.
nenjil vittu vittu
vedi vedikkum.

Chinnavane..
ennavane....
mookku mookku vaithu
netri mutti vida vaadaa.

ennai kondaada
pirandhavane.
idhayam rendaaga
pilarndhavane.
osai illaamal
nulaindhavane.
uyirai kan kondu
kadaindhavane.
